price: Au unawaomba ujira, na wao wanaemewa na gharama hiyo?
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ
footnotes: Kwani wewe unawaomba ujira kwa kuufikisha Ujumbe wako, na kwa hivyo wao wanaona uzito kwa gharama hiyo unayo wakalifisha?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qalūna
